resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82519</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82519</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15344</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Rechtsakte der EU</string>
            <string language="en">Legal-files of the EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Légal-fichiers de l'EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Legal-limas do EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legale-archivi dell'UE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νομικός-αρχεία της ΕΕ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Legal-ficheros del EU</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Die verschiedenen Rechtsakte der EU werden erläutert. Außerdem ist die Übung zu den verschiedenen Gremien mit der Bezeichnung "Rat" integriert.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Bodammer;Christiane;;;
FN:Christiane Bodammer
ORG:BBS OHZ
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15344</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>creator</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Bodammer;Christiane;;;
FN:Christiane Bodammer
ORG:
END:VCARD</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2006-05-29</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:;European Schoolnet
FN:European Schoolnet
ORG:European Schoolnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>de</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>higher education</value>
          </context>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>vocational education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">15-19</string>
            <string language="de">15-19</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Die verschiedenen Rechtsakte der EU können erarbeitet werden, bzw. Kenntnisse können überprüft werden. Ergänzend kann die Sicherheit im Umgang mit Gremienbezeichnungen am Beispiel "Rat" überprüft werden.</string>
            <string language="en">The different legal-acts of the EC can be developed, as well as knowledge can be checked. Additionally the certainty can be checked "council" in the contact with Gremienbezeichnungen at the example.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc"><rdf:RDF xmlns="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"><Work rdf:about=""><license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/" /></Work><License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/"><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/DerivativeWorks" /><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice" /></License></rdf:RDF></string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>671</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="de">internationale Organisation</string>
                <string language="en">international organisation</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
            <taxon>
              <id>275</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="de">Europarat</string>
                <string language="en">Council of Europe</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
            <taxon>
              <id>455</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="de">Europäische Union</string>
                <string language="en">European Union</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
            <taxon>
              <id>733</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="de">Gesetzgebung</string>
                <string language="en">legislation</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
            <taxon>
              <id>453</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="de">Europapolitik</string>
                <string language="en">European policy</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>82519</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://myeurope.eun.org/shared/data/myeurope/2005/los/05/gausepohl/eu-rate/RechtsakteEU.htm</uri>
      </location>
    </item>

</expression>
